program combined

implicit none

integer :: n, i, result, min_val

integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: a

character(len=20) :: str_result

character :: first_char

integer :: ascii_val, new_ascii

!
children.label: high_level_plan

children.text:
Read input

read*, n

allocate(a(n))

read*, a

! Process first part

call sort(a)

min_val = a(1)

result = min_val do i = 1, n

   if (mod(a(i), min_val) /= 0) then

      result = -1

      exit

   end if

end do

! Now process second part

write(str_result, '(I0)') result

first_char = str_result(1:1) ascii_val = ichar(first_char)

new_ascii = ascii_val + 1

print*, char(new_ascii)

deallocate(a)

end program combined

program combined

implicit none

integer :: n, i, result, min_val

integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: a

character(len=20) :: str_result

character :: first_char

integer :: ascii_val, new_ascii

! Read input

read*, n

allocate(a(n))

read*, a

! Process first part

call sort(a)

min_val = a(1)

result = min_val

do i = 1, n

   if (mod(a(i), min_val) /= 0) then

      result = -1

      exit

   end if

end do

! Now process second part

write(str_result, '(I0)') result

first_char = str_result(1:1)

ascii_val = ichar(first_char)

new_ascii = ascii_val + 1

print*, char(new_ascii)

deallocate(a)

end program combined

program combined

implicit none

integer :: n, i, result, min_val

integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: a

character(len=20) :: str_result

character :: first_char

integer :: ascii_val, new_ascii

! Read input

read*, n

allocate(a(n))

read*, a

! Process first part

call sort(a)

min_val = a(1)

result = min_val

do i = 1, n

   if (mod(a(i), min_val) /= 0) then

      result = -1

      exit

   end if

end do

! Now process second part

write(str_result, '(I0)') result

first_char = str_result(1:1)

ascii_val = ichar(first_char)

new_ascii = ascii_val + 1

write(*, '(A)', advance='no') char(new_ascii)

deallocate(a)

end program combined
